Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Considering its unique features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I'm offering it to you for $125. I'm confident you'll find its benefits to be well worth the investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
